text: 151 active users of the extension. Glad to know it’s helping people

beta testers I pushed a small update. If you have UI Tweaks enabled you should notice your Design Manager tab’s title change. More info:
<https://github.com/williamspiro/HubSpot-Developer-Extension/releases/tag/v1.04-beta.2>

Please send feedback if you like/dislike it or want changes.
